Select \"Yes\" to enable custom color pi: Select "Yes" to enable custom color picker component.
Set Pre loaded template for this product: Set Pre loaded template for this product ?
Select \"Enable\" to enable object align: Select "Enable" to enable object alignment position in your tool
Select \"Yes\" to enable product designe: Select "Yes" to enable product designer in your eCommerce store.
Select \"Enable\" to display \"Design It: Select "Enable" to display "Design It" button on Category Page and "Disable" to hide "Design It" button from Category Page.
Add to Cart Button on Category Page: Add to Cart Button on Category Page
Select \"Enable\" to display \"Add to Ca: Select "Enable" to display "Add to Cart" button on Category Page and "Disable" to hide "Add to Cart" button on Category Page.
Add a fixed cost which will be added for: Add a fixed cost which will be added for custom designed products.
Add image to be shown at the place of ac: Add image to be shown at the place of actual image before actual image loads completely.
Add price which will be charged for addi: Add price which will be charged for adding a text for Product Customization.
Add price which will be charged for adding an image for Product Customization.
Additional Cost per Custom Uploaded Imag: Additional Cost per Custom Uploaded Image
Add price which will be charged for uplo: Add price which will be charged for uploaded image with "Additional Cost per Added Image".
Select the image type in which customize: Select the image type in which customized image will be downloaded.
Enter number of days for which unused de: Enter number of days for which unused design images by guest users need to be kept.
Select Yes to enable 'Generate SVG' butt: Select Yes to enable 'Generate SVG' button for design-orders to generate SVG image as print ready file.
Enable Handles Outside The Design Area: Enable Handles Outside The Design Area
Select Yes to allow handles outside the: Select Yes to allow handles outside the canvas. It will work for single design area only.
Click on translate button to change lang: Click on translate button to change language of the store elements like Button and Messages. It will be translated for all availabale stores based on updated CSV in Locale files.
Select \"Yes\" to enable interactive use: Select "Yes" to enable interactive user guide on Product Designer Tool.
Enter life span of cached data on Magent: Enter life span of cached data on Magento in seconds.
Select a default font for the text.
Select a default font size for the text.
Select \"Yes\" to set maximum text-objec: Select "Yes" to set maximum text-objects allowed in a single design area.
Add text object limit. User will not be: Add text object limit. User will not be able to add more text objects on single design area than the set limit.
Add the message which will be displayed: Add the message which will be displayed if the number of characters exceeds the set text limit
Select \"Yes\" to set maximum clipart al: Select "Yes" to set maximum clipart allowed in a single design area
Select a default category for clipart wh: Select a default category for clipart which will be shown to users when they opt for clipart addition
Add Clipart limit. User will not be able: Add Clipart limit. User will not be able to add more Clipart on single design area than the set limit.
Add the message which will displayed if: Add the message which will displayed if the number of added images exceeds the set image limit.
Select \"Yes\" to show instructions whil: Select "Yes" to show instructions while uploading a customized image.
Add the instruction to be displayed whil: Add the instruction to be displayed while uploading a customized image
Select \"Yes\" to set maximum Images all: Select "Yes" to set maximum Images allowed in a single design area
Add Image limit. User will not be able t: Add Image limit. User will not be able to add more Images on a single design area than the set limit.
Add the message which will be displayed: Add the message which will be displayed if the number of images exceeds the limit for customized images
Please enter the minimum size of the ima: Please enter the minimum size of the image. It should be in MB(Megabyte)
Please enter the maximum size of the ima: Please enter the maximum size of the image. It should be in MB(Megabyte)
Select \"Yes\" to ask for user's confirm: Select "Yes" to ask for user's confirmation before uplaoding the csutom image
Add the confirmation message which will: Add the confirmation message which will be displayed to the user before uploading the custom image
Select \"Yes\" to enable the download of: Select "Yes" to enable the download of design from the designer page
Add your label for design it button: Add your label for design it button
Add warning message to be shown when any: Add warning message to be shown when any object goes out of the design area.
Add warning message to be shown when add: Add warning message to be shown when added image object is of low resolution.
Select \"Yes\" to enable all products se: Select "Yes" to enable all products section on tool page
Add first tooltip description for user g: Add first tooltip description for user guide of 'All Products
Add second tooltip description for user: Add second tooltip description for user guide of 'All Products'
Set default color which will be shown on: Set default color which will be shown on any color picker throughout the product customization tool.
The list includes all the tabs which are: The list includes all the tabs which are neither Main Tabs or Sub Tabs.
Name: Name
Title: Title
Click here or drag and drop to add image: Click here or drag and drop to add images. (Accepted Files : JPG, JPEG, PNG, SVG )
Label: Label
Accepted Files : jpg, jpeg, gif, png: Accepted Files : jpg, jpeg, gif, png
Allow multiple products in add to cart: Allow multiple products in add to cart
Minimum length of this field must be equ: Minimum length of this field must be equal or greater than 8 symbols
Confirm Password must match with passwor: Confirm Password must match with password field
Removal of main tabs which contains subt: Removal of main tabs which contains subtabs will result in removal of those subtabs as well
Distribute Vertically (must select 3 or: Distribute Vertically (must select 3 or more objects)
Distribute Horizontally (must select 3 o: Distribute Horizontally (must select 3 or more objects)
Add your instagram client secret key: Add your instagram client secret key
Add your instagram client secret key
Select the theme of the designer tool: Select the theme of the designer tool
Primary Color is set for all other relat: Primary Color is set for all other related colors of the tool. Do not use very light color otherwise text content will not be visible.
Click on Save Button to Save Theme: Click on Save Button to Save Theme
Add logo that will be displayed for dark: Add logo that will be displayed for dark theme.
Add an Image which will be added as a wa: Add an Image which will be added as a watermark in the downloaded customized product image. Allowed file type: png.
Add text which will be displayed as wate: Add text which will be displayed as watermark in the downloaded customized product image. You can add upto 8 characters for the text.
